summary: An ordinance relating to the acquisition of property by condemnation for the Lake Way and Rainier Avenue Traffic Interchange, et al., under Ordinance No. 80892, authorizing expenditures by the Engineering and Law Departments in connection therewith, increasing the appropriation from the City Street Fund therefor from $10,000.00 to $15,000.00, and amending Section 1 of Ordinance No. 81282.
